ygData.subject: RE: Sonorous Clounding
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I didn t MEAN to stay that late... but it suddenly occurred to me I could make 7 if I stayed just a little bit longer -- Which ended up taking much
ygData.messageBody:
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:honeyman@...]
>Sent: Friday, February 04, 2000 8:27 AM

>> *sigh* *small voice* Two levels in two hours?
>> My baby bard went from level 5 to level 7 last night...
>> But it took me from 10:30p to 4am... How did you do it
>> so FAST?...

> 4am?!?! Holy smokes, Fae.. how do you manage to do anything
> during the day? I thought I was bad for staying up to 1am.

I didn't MEAN to stay that late... but it suddenly occurred to
me I could make 7 if I stayed "just a little bit longer" --
Which ended up taking much longer than I thought... I should
know better. You'd think after all the times I tell others
I level slowly, that I would believe it by now.

> (now you are only 7, sigh... when will you be 18? ;p )

I recreated Faesong on Solusek Ro... SHe got up to 2 bubbles from 17
on Test when I realized where my true friends were. So I created her
(as a Half Elf, not Wood Elf, so she could be half Inky) on Sol Ro. It's
going to take me a bit to get back there. I'm sorry :( ...But I
have to be where my friends are... EVen if I can't group with them
except for when they decide to play their secondaries. I still want
to be where we can at least /tell!

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Meara, level 13 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faerain, level 18 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 7 HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Solusek Ro (Qeynos Hills)
